pages.text: $(li)The Cleric is a master of the arcane and unknown.$(br)$(li)It will trade you $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/redstone)Redstone$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/lapis_lazuli)Lapis Lazuli$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/glowstone_dust)Glowstone Dust$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/experience_bottle)Bottle O' Enchanting$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ender_pearl)Ender Pearls$(/l) for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and vice versa.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Cleric profession if is near of a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).
